parsing_warnings: Sum of line items = $600.00 but SUBTOTAL printed as $400.00 — discrepancy present
Tax monetary amount not explicitly printed (only 'Tax 10%'); tax amount left null per rule to not invent values
Seller/company name and contact details are not clearly labeled; PAY TO block used to infer seller/payee (account name: Adeline Palmerston)
checks: Calculated sum of line item totals = 6 × $100 = $600.00, but SUBTOTAL printed = $400.00 (mismatch).

Grand total printed = $440.00. If using printed SUBTOTAL $400.00, tax at 10% would equal $40.00 and TOTAL = $440.00 (matches printed TOTAL). However, printed line items sum ($600.00) does not reconcile with printed SUBTOTAL ($400.00).
Tax rate indicated as 10% (visible) but no explicit tax amount printed — tax amount was not set to avoid inventing values.
